text: Oleh Protasov (born February 4, 1964) is a former Ukrainian football player. He has played for the Soviet Union national team and the Ukrainian national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk 1982 4 1 0 0 0 0 4 1 1983 21 7 2 0 0 0 23 7 1984 34 17 2 2 6 0 42 19 1985 33 35 2 1 6 4 41 40 1986 23 17 1 1 2 0 26 18 1987 30 18 4 3 0 0 34 21 Dynamo Kyiv 1988 29 11 5 2 0 0 34 13 1989 26 7 6 2 3 1 35 10 1990 16 12 1 1 0 0 17 13 Olympiacos 1990–91 29 11 2 1 0 0 31 12 1991–92 21 15 6 3 0 0 27 18 1992–93 24 14 9 3 4 1 37 18 1993–94 9 8 4 1 1 0 14 9 Gamba Osaka 1994 27 11 4 4 3 0 34 15 1995 28 13 0 0 0 0 28 13 Veria 1997 30 4 4 1 0 0 34 5 1998 32 7 1 0 0 0 33 7 Proodeftiki 1998 28 5 0 0 0 0 28 5 Career total 444 213 53 25 25 6 522 244 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Soviet Union 1984 5 2 1985 12 8 1986 3 0 1987 9 2 1988 18 10 1989 8 3 1990 11 3 1991 2 1 Total 68 29 Ukraine 1994 1 0 Total 1 0 :Scores and results list the Soviet Union's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Protasov goal.
